sourceMeaningMnemonic: You only have a <radical>few</radical> <radical>eye</radical>s so you need to <kanji>conserve</kanji> what's left.
meaningInfo: You only have like, three eyes left. If you conserve them .
readingMnemonic: You're trying to <kanji>conserve</kanji> your eyes, when the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>) marches by. He stops, sees you, and demands you give him your remaining eyes! But sir, I'm conserving what little I have left!
readingInfo: The Shougun stares down at you, eyes blazing, and you hand over all but one of your eyes. Now you really have to conserve, or you'll be blind. Thanks Shougun. I bet he has plenty of eyes, he didn't need yours.
